ValidationRule.description: A PIN Number can't have 4 consecutive Numbers
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNUMBER(PIN__c), MID(PIN__c, 1,1) = MID(PIN__c, 2,1), MID(PIN__c, 1,1) = MID(PIN__c, 3,1), MID(PIN__c, 1,1) = MID(PIN__c, 4,1) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PIN Can NOT be 4 consecutive numbers
